text.fire_extinguisher.fire_armor_config: The fire protection will be renewed every %1$s secs for %2$s secs.
text.fire_extinguisher.fire_armor_light_: The light fire protection will be renewed every %1$s secs for %2$s secs.
text.fire_extinguisher.fire_armor_slow_d: Wearing this heavy fire protective armor will slow down your movements.
text.fire_extinguisher.fire_axe_descript: The fire axe is able to remove fire within %1$s blocks around a block.
text.fire_extinguisher.fire_axe_use: ► To use the fire axe target a block which is on fire and use the right mouse button or destroy the block.
text.fire_extinguisher.fire_boots_descri: The heavy fire boots protects you from fire, but your are not fire proofed.
text.fire_extinguisher.fire_boots_light_: The light fire boots protects you a little from fire, but don't slowdown your movements.
text.fire_extinguisher.fire_chestplate_d: The heavy fire chestplate protects you from fire, but your are not fire proofed.
text.fire_extinguisher.fire_chestplate_l: The light fire chestplate protects you a little from fire, but allows smoother movements.
text.fire_extinguisher.fire_extinguisher: ► To place the fire extinguisher, sneak and press the right mouse button.
► To use the fire extinguisher target a block which is on (or next to the) fire and press the right mouse button.
text.fire_extinguisher.fire_helmet_descr: The fire helmet protects you from fire, but your are not fire proofed.
text.fire_extinguisher.fire_helmet_light: The light fire helmet protects you a little from fire and allows a better view.
text.fire_extinguisher.fire_leggings_des: The heavy fire leggings protects you from fire, but your are not fire proofed.
text.fire_extinguisher.fire_leggings_lig: The light fire leggings protects you a little from fire and fell comfortable.
tooltip.fire_extinguisher.exit_sign: The exit sign can be placed on the wall or ceiling to show the way to the next exit.
tooltip.fire_extinguisher.fire_alarm_bel: The fire alarm bell can be turn on with the fire alarm switch, smoke detector or any other redstone device.
tooltip.fire_extinguisher.fire_alarm_sir: The fire alarm siren can be turn on with the fire alarm switch, smoke detector or any other redstone device.
tooltip.fire_extinguisher.fire_alarm_smo: The smoke detector will send a redstone signal to turn on the fire sprinkler, fire alarm bell, fire alarm siren or any other redstone device as soon fire is detected.
The smoke detector has the following status:
tooltip.fire_extinguisher.fire_alarm_swi: The fire alarm switch can be used to turn on/off the fire alarm, fire sprinkler or any other redstone device.
tooltip.fire_extinguisher.fire_extinguis: The fire extinguisher is able to remove fire from a %1$s block radius and can freeze mobs for a small amount of time.
The fire extinguisher sign can be placed on the wall or ceiling to show the way to the next fire extinguisher.
tooltip.fire_extinguisher.fire_sprinkler: The fire sprinkler can be turn on with the fire alarm switch, smoke detector or any other redstone device.
